name: SHRI GANESH GRAMIN VIKAS SHIKSHAN SANSTHAN
briefDescription: We are started our organization in 21.01.1993. From 1993 to 2017 till today successful we implemented the number of projects. We also awarded by DR.BABASAHEB AMBEDKAR DALIT MITRA AWARD for our excellence work is the field of AGRICULTURE, HEALTH, and WATERSHED EDUCATION & SOCIAL WORK.	              Our organization came into being in 1993. The Indian non-profit sector was developing rapidly. Emerging leaders were creating organization to implement specific projects; they were full of ideas, willing to make a difference, and were able to solicit financial support from numerous Indian & foreign organizations. They, however, locked experience and knowledge. The SGGVSS became the unique educational & social technologies and development new ones. The SHRI GANESH GRAMIN VIKAS SHIKSHAN SANSTHA centre providing support to rural and urban poor people free of charge.
